import {React, useState,useMemo} from 'react' import { FlexCol, PaddingX, Padding, FlexRow } from '../constants/style' import { Fade, Slide } from 'react-reveal'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import Pulse from 'react-reveal/Pulse'; export default function Table() { const category = "떡볶이류"; const menuList = [ {menu:"진짜떡볶이", price: 3000, count: 0}, {menu:"치즈떡볶이", price: 3500, count: 0}, ] return (

{category}

{menuList.map((item, index) => (

{item.menu}

{item.price}원

{item.count}

))}
) }
